profile.name: Randy Hendriyawan
profile.tagline: Creating immersive experiences through code and creativity.
profile.education: Undergraduate Student at Sumatera Institute of Technology, Major in Informatics Engineering
bio: I’m Randy Hendriyawan, an undergraduate student majoring in Informatics Engineering at Institut Teknologi Sumatera (ITERA). I’m a developer and game creator with a strong passion for technology, digital media, and interactive design.

My work spans web development, game development, and content creation, combining technical precision with creativity. I enjoy turning ideas into functional and engaging digital experiences from building scalable web platforms to designing immersive gameplay mechanics.

With hands-on experience in full-stack development, Unity, and UE4, I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and building user-centered solutions. I’m also deeply interested in blending education, interactivity, and entertainment through technology.
When I’m not coding or designing, I explore emerging tech trends, contribute to open-source projects, and collaborate on innovative student initiatives that drive learning and creativity.

projects.title: Project SkinEd: AI Skin Type Detection
projects.summary: AI-powered facial skin classification system using ResNet50 and web-based interface.

screenshots.caption: Main interface – upload and detection page
Detection result with skin type and recommendations

outcomes: Successfully implemented ResNet50 fine-tuned for 3-class skin type recognition (normal, dry, oily)
Achieved high evaluation performance with ROC-AUC > 0.90 for all classes
Integrated live inference through Haar-Cascade face detection and Flask backend
Showcased at Informatics Expo 2025 as an applied AI project

projects.title: Sumateran Roar
projects.summary: Dead by Daylight-inspired multiplayer horror game set in Sumatra.

screenshots.caption: People testing the game at Informatics Expo ITERA 2025

outcomes: Unique setting and storyline based on Sumatra

projects.title: Too Much Pixels
projects.summary: 2D top-down survival pixel-art game with engaging gameplay mechanics and retro aesthetics.

Implemented multiplayer coop mode enhancing user engagement
